title: Nutriota Chromium Picolinate | 250 mcg (365 Tablets)
aboutContent: Support your metabolic health and wellness goals with Nutriota Chromium Picolinate. This essential trace mineral is formulated for high absorption and comes in a convenient one-year supply. Each tablet provides 250 mcg of chromium to help support healthy blood sugar levels, promote efficient metabolism of carbohydrates, fats, and protein, and assist in controlling sugar cravings. A simple, once-daily supplement for year-round well-being.
descriptionContent: Chromium is an essential trace element naturally contained in many foods, although in small quantities. Our easy to swallow tablets are suitable for vegetarians and vegans and allow you to benefit from the positive effects of chromium. This supplement is essential to help regulate macronutrient metabolism and maintain normal blood glucose levels.
ingredientsContent: Bulking agent (calcium phosphate, microcrystalline cellulose), tablet coating [glazing agent (polydextrose, hydroxypropylmethylcellulose), maltodextrin, bulking agent (calcium carbonate), glazing agent (guar gum), medium chain triglycerides], chromium picolinate, anti-caking agent (magnetic salts. fatty acid sicas, silicon dioxide).
generalInfoContent:
Manufacturer: Nutriota
Package Dimensions: 8.9 x 4.4 x 4.1 cm; 90 g
ASIN: B0DCZJDCKH
